author: makortel
body:
#### PR description:

This PR adds support for wildcard in EDAlias type field, i.e.
```python
alias = cms.EDAlias(
    module = cms.VPSet(
        cms.PSet(
            type = cms.string("*")
        )
    )
)
```

For the case that the EDAlias should pick all products of a module, the following shorthand is included
```python
alias = cms.EDAlias(
    module = cms.EDAlias.allProducts()
)
```


Resolves https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/issues/29847

#### PR validation:

Framework unit tests pass
title: Add support for wildcard in EDAlias type field
